sqls.sql: SELECT app.id, app.APPLICATION_NO, app.APP_TYPE, app.SERVICE_ID, app.LICENCE_ID, app.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID, app.BASE_APP_ID, app.BASE_LICENCE_ID, app.NEED_INSPECTION, app.STATUS, app.APP_GRP_ID, app.CREATED_DT, app.CREATED_BY, app.UPDATED_DT, app.UPDATED_BY FROM APPLICATION AS app WHERE 1=1 <#if APPLICATION_NO??> AND CHARINDEX(:APPLICATION_NO, app.APPLICATION_NO) >0</#if> <#if STATUS??> AND app.STATUS = :STATUS</#if> <#if APP_TYPE??> AND app.APP_TYPE = :APP_TYPE</#if>

select sec_item.id as id, chkl.id as config_id, item_pool.id as item_id, chkl.is_common as common, chkl.svc_code as svc_code, hs.svc_name as svc_name, chkl.svc_subtype_name as svc_subtype_name, chkl.module as module, chkl.[type] as svc_type, chkl.hci_code as hci_code, sec.section_name as section_name, sec.section_desc as section_desc, sec.[order] as section_order, item_pool.question as checklist_item, item_pool.answer_type, item_pool.risk_level as risk_level, regulation.clause_no as clause_no, regulation.clause as clause, hs.id as service_id from chkl_config_hcsa_service chkl inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_section sec on chkl.id = sec.chkl_config_id inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_section_item sec_item on sec_item.section_id = sec.id inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_item_pool item_pool on sec_item.item_id = item_pool.id inner join chkl_config_hcsa_svc_regulation regulation on item_pool.regulation_id = regulation.id left join hcsa_service hs on hs.svc_code = chkl.svc_code where 1=1 <#if svc_code??> and chkl.svc_code in (:svc_code)</#if> <#if svc_type??> and chkl.[type] = :svc_type</#if> <#if common??> and chkl.is_common = :common</#if> <#if configId??> and chkl.id = :configId</#if>

sql.remarks: query service name and service code by servce id

sqls.sql: select chkl.id as config_id, hcsa.id as service_id, hcsa.svc_name as svc_name, hcsa.svc_code as svc_code, chkl.is_common as common from chkl_config_hcsa_service chkl left join hcsa_service hcsa on chkl.svc_code = hcsa.svc_code where chkl.[TYPE] = 'Self-Assessment' UNION select chkl.id as config_id, hcsa.id as service_id, hcsa.svc_name as svc_name, hcsa.svc_code as svc_code, chkl.is_common as common from chkl_config_hcsa_service chkl left join hcsa_service hcsa on chkl.svc_code = hcsa.svc_code where chkl.[TYPE] = 'Self-Assessment' <#if svcId??> ${svcId}</#if>

select T1.ID AS ID, T2.SVC_NAME AS SVC_NAME, T2.SVC_TYPE AS SVC_TYPE, T1.SERVICE_CODE AS SERVICE_CODE , T1.PERIOD_AFTER_APP AS PERIOD_AFTER_APP, T1.PERIOD_BEFORE_EXP AS PERIOD_BEFORE_EXP, T1.NON_REPLY_WINDOW AS NON_REPLY_WINDOW, T1.STATUS, T1.VERSION from hcsa_service_specific_inspect_period T1, hcsa_service T2 WHERE T1.STATUS = 'CMSTAT001' AND T2.STATUS = 'CMSTAT001' AND T1.SERVICE_CODE = T2.SVC_CODE <#if id??> AND T1.ID = :id</#if> <#if svcName??> AND T2.SVC_NAME = :svcName</#if> <#if svcType??> AND T2.SVC_TYPE = :svcType</#if> <#if svcCode??> AND T1.SERVICE_CODE = :svcCode</#if> <#if periodAfterApp??> AND T1.PERIOD_AFTER_APP = :periodAfterApp</#if> <#if periodBeforeExp??> AND T1.PERIOD_BEFORE_EXP = :periodBeforeExp</#if> <#if nonReplyWindow??> AND T1.NON_REPLY_WINDOW = :nonReplyWindow</#if>

select ID,LICENCE_NO,SVC_NAME,START_DATE,POSTAL_CODE,BLK_NO,FLOOR_NO,UNIT_NO,STREET_NAME,BUILDING_NAME,EXPIRY_DATE,HCI_NAME,VEHICLE_NO,PREMISES_TYPE,ORDER_INDEX from ( SELECT top(1) ID, '' as LICENCE_NO, 'first' as SVC_NAME, '' as START_DATE, '' as POSTAL_CODE, '' as BLK_NO, '' as FLOOR_NO, '' as UNIT_NO, '' as STREET_NAME, '' as BUILDING_NAME, '' as EXPIRY_DATE, '' as HCI_NAME, '' as VEHICLE_NO, '' as PREMISES_TYPE, '0' as ORDER_INDEX from LICENCE UNION SELECT T3.ID, T1.LICENCE_NO, T1.SVC_NAME, T1.START_DATE, T3.POSTAL_CODE, T3.BLK_NO, T3.FLOOR_NO, T3.UNIT_NO, T3.STREET_NAME, T3.BUILDING_NAME, T1.EXPIRY_DATE, T3.HCI_NAME , T3.VEHICLE_NO, T3.PREMISES_TYPE, '1' as ORDER_INDEX FROM LICENCE T1 JOIN LIC_PREMISES T2 on T2.LICENCE_ID = T1.id JOIN PREMISES T3 on T2.PREMISES_ID = T3.id where T1.status in ('LICEST001') <#if serName??> and T1.SVC_NAME IN ${serName} </#if> <#if licenseeId??> AND T1.LICENSEE_ID = :licenseeId</#if> <#if premTypeList??>AND T3.PREMISES_TYPE IN ${premTypeList}</#if> <#if alignMinExpiryMonth??>AND DATEDIFF(MONTH ,getDate(),T1.EXPIRY_DATE) >= :alignMinExpiryMonth</#if> )tab1 order by tab1.ORDER_INDEX ASC
